content.rendered:
Amadi Harry Excellent is a serial entrepreneur, visionary leader, and accomplished professional in the realm of real estate with a strong commitment to human capital development, education and public speaking.

He stands as the CEO of Hamrex properties limited (a contemporary company set outside to provide decent housing solutions to all classes of human endeavor) and the founder of the Port Harcourt Real Estate Academy.

As the CEO of Hamrex Properties and Construction Limited, Amadi Harry Excellent has exhibited an unwavering dedication to excellence and innovation. Under his astute leadership, the company has become a leading player in the real estate sector, renowned for its unparalleled quality and customer-centric approach.

Through his strategic vision and meticulous attention to detail, Amadi Harry Excellent has successfully spearheaded numerous construction and development projects, leaving an indelible mark on the skyline of Port Harcourt and beyond.

Amadi Harry Excellent’s passion for human capital development is evident in his role as the founder of the Port Harcourt Real Estate Academy. Recognizing the importance of empowering individuals with the knowledge and skills required to succeed in the industry.

He is also the founder of the Port Harcourt Free Skill acquisition training PHSAT, a program that offers free skill acquisition training to 1000 youths yearly.

Beyond his roles as a CEO and founder, Amadi Harry Excellent is an accomplished public speaker, he captivates audiences with his eloquence, wisdom, and ability to inspire.

Drawing from his vast experience in the real estate domain, he shares invaluable insights and strategies, encouraging others to pursue their passions, embrace personal growth, and unlock their full potential. His compelling speeches have garnered acclaim and have made him a sought-after speaker at industry conferences, corporate events, and educational institutions.

With a profound understanding of the real estate industry and an unwavering commitment to human capital development and public speaking, Amadi Harry Excellent has established himself as a prominent figure within and out the real estate industry.

His passion for excellence, innovation, and transformative leadership has set him apart.
